statements: SELECT * FROM retirement_projections WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, current_savings FROM retirement_projections WHERE retirement_age < 65;
SELECT id, name, retirement_goal FROM retirement_projections WHERE current_savings >= 10000;
SELECT * FROM retirement_projections WHERE age BETWEEN 45 AND 60;
SELECT id, name, current_savings, retirement_goal FROM retirement_projections;
SELECT * FROM retirement_projections WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, current_savings FROM retirement_projections WHERE current_savings > 100000 ORDER BY current_savings ASC;
SELECT name, retirement_goal FROM retirement_projections WHERE retirement_goal >= 1000000;
SELECT * FROM retirement_projections WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 45 AND current_savings < 50000;
SELECT id, name, age, retirement_age, current_savings, retirement_goal FROM retirement_projections WHERE age < retirement_age ORDER BY retirement_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM retirement_data;
SELECT user_id, savings, primary_goal FROM retirement_data ORDER BY savings DESC;
SELECT user_id, retirement_age FROM retirement_data WHERE primary_goal = 'Financial Independence';
SELECT primary_goal, lifestyle_goal FROM retirement_data WHERE lifestyle_goal IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, projected_income FROM projections WHERE current_age < 40;
SELECT * FROM retirement_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, primary_goal FROM retirement_data ORDER BY primary_goal ASC;
SELECT id, savings FROM retirement_data WHERE savings > 50000 AND lifestyle_goal = 'Travel';
SELECT * FROM projections WHERE current_age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY projected_income DESC;
SELECT user_id, retirement_age, primary_goal, lifestyle_goal FROM retirement_data WHERE primary_goal LIKE '%Retire%' AND lifestyle_goal IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, desired_retirement_income FROM users WHERE retirement_age < 65;
SELECT * FROM savings ORDER BY current_savings DESC;
SELECT user_id, travel_budget, health_care_budget FROM lifestyle_goals;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT user_id, name FROM users ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT user_id, desired_retirement_income FROM users WHERE retirement_age < 60
SELECT * FROM lifestyle_goals WHERE travel_budget > 5000 AND health_care_budget < 2000
SELECT u.user_id, u.name, s.current_savings FROM users u JOIN savings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id
SELECT * FROM retirement_savings;
SELECT id, user_id, current_savings FROM retirement_savings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, projected_monthly_income, projected_life_expectancy FROM projections WHERE projected_life_expectancy >= 80;
SELECT user_id, desired_monthly_income, health_care_expenses FROM lifestyle_goals WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT MAX(projected_monthly_income) AS max_income, MIN(projected_monthly_income) AS min_income FROM projections;
SELECT user_id, SUM(current_savings) AS total_savings FROM retirement_savings GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.name, p.projected_monthly_income, r.current_savings FROM users u JOIN projections p ON u.id = p.user_id JOIN retirement_savings r ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE r.current_savings > 50000;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM income_sources WHERE amount > 5000
SELECT id, goal_name, target_amount FROM goals WHERE target_amount < 10000 ORDER BY target_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM projections WHERE year = 2022
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN income_sources ON users.id = income_sources.user_id WHERE users.age > 30 ORDER BY users.name ASC, income_sources.amount DESC
SELECT users.name, goals.goal_name, goals.target_amount FROM users INNER JOIN goals ON users.id = goals.user_id WHERE goals.target_amount > users.savings
SELECT expenses.expense_name, SUM(expenses.amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY expenses.expense_name HAVING total_expenses > 1000

SELECT users.name, projections.year, projections.projected_income, projections.projected_expenses, projections.projected_savings FROM users INNER JOIN projections ON users.id = projections.user_id WHERE projections.year = 2022
SELECT users.name, income_sources.source_name, income_sources.amount FROM users INNER JOIN income_sources ON users.id = income_sources.user_id WHERE income_sources.amount < 5000
